trans-unit.resname: LCC·1 | Admiral Brass, Unsinkable | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Admiral Brass, Unsinkable
trans-unit.target: 不沉传奇霸司总帅

trans-unit.resname: LCC·1 | Admiral Brass, Unsinkable | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When Admiral Brass, Unsinkable enters the battlefield, mill four cards.
trans-unit.target: 当不沉传奇霸司总帅进战场时，磨四张牌。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·1 | Admiral Brass, Unsinkable | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may return target Pirate creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. It has base power and toughness 4/4. It gains haste until end of turn. (If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，你可以将目标海盗生物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场，且其上有一个终命指示物。它的基础力量与防御力为4/4。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。（如果其上有终命指示物的生物将死去，则改为放逐之。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·2 | Clavileño, First of the Blessed | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Clavileño, First of the Blessed
trans-unit.target: 受福众首克莱维诺

trans-unit.resname: LCC·2 | Clavileño, First of the Blessed | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you attack, target attacking Vampire that isn't a Demon becomes a Demon in addition to its other types. It gains "When this creature dies, draw a card and create a tapped 4/3 white and black Vampire Demon creature token with flying."
trans-unit.target: 每当你攻击时，目标进行攻击且不是恶魔的吸血鬼成为恶魔，且仍具有原本类别。它获得「当此生物死去时，抓一张牌且派出一个已横置的4/3，黑白双色，具飞行异能的吸血鬼／恶魔衍生生物。」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·3 | Hakbal of the Surging Soul | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Hakbal of the Surging Soul
trans-unit.target: 翻涌之魂哈巴尔

trans-unit.resname: LCC·3 | Hakbal of the Surging Soul | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of combat on your turn, each Merfolk creature you control explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on the exploring creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: 在你回合的战斗开始时，令每个由你操控的人鱼勘察。（展示你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是地，则置于你手上。若否，则在令之勘察的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后将所展示的牌放回原位或置入你的坟墓场。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·3 | Hakbal of the Surging Soul | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Hakbal of the Surging Soul attacks, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you don't, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当翻涌之魂哈巴尔攻击时，你可以将一张地牌从你手上放进战场。若你未如此作，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Pantlaza, Sun-Favored
trans-unit.target: 烈阳眷恩潘塔札

trans-unit.source: Whenever Pantlaza, Sun-Favored or another Dinosaur enters the battlefield under your control, you may discover X, where X is that creature's toughness. Do this only once each turn. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 每当烈阳眷恩潘塔札或另一个恐龙在你的操控下进战场时，你可以倾探X，X为该生物的防御力。每回合只能如此作一次。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher
trans-unit.target: 残忍天行客卡门

trans-unit.resname: LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player sacrifices a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手牺牲一个永久物时，在残忍天行客卡门上放置一个+1/+1指示物且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·5 | Carmen, Cruel Skymarcher | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever Carmen attacks, return up to one target permanent card with mana value less than or equal to Carmen's power from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每当卡门攻击时，将至多一张目标法术力值等于或小于卡门力量的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Don Andres, the Renegade
trans-unit.target: 变节军将唐安德烈

trans-unit.resname: LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature you control but don't own gets +2/+2, has menace and deathtouch, and is a Pirate in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 每个由你操控但不由你拥有的生物各得+2/+2，具有威慑与死触异能，且额外具有海盗此生物类别。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell you don't own, create two tapped Treasure tokens.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放不由你拥有的非生物咒语时，派出两个已横置的珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·6 | Don Andres, the Renegade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why climb the tangled rigging of the Legion of Dusk's hierarchy when I can fly a free flag of my own?"
trans-unit.target: 「如果我能够自立旗帜，又何必依照暮影军团的繁缛章法循阶晋升？」

trans-unit.resname: LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wayta, Trainer Prodigy
trans-unit.target: 驯龙逸才薇塔

trans-unit.resname: LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste
trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.resname: LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{G}, {T}: Target creature you control fights another target creature. This ability costs {2} less to activate if it targets two creatures you control.
trans-unit.target: {2}{G}，{T}：目标由你操控的生物与另一个目标生物互斗。如果此异能以两个由你操控的生物为目标，则减少{2}来起动。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·7 | Wayta, Trainer Prodigy | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: If a creature you control being dealt damage causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.
trans-unit.target: 如果由你操控之永久物的触发式异能因由你操控的生物受到伤害而触发，则该异能额外触发一次。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·8 | Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood
trans-unit.target: 笑面浪涛索拉托雅

trans-unit.resname: LCC·8 | Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood enters the battlefield or attacks, put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island in addition to its other types for as long as it has a flood counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 每当笑面浪涛索拉托雅进战场或攻击时，在目标地上放置一个洪水指示物。只要该地上有洪水指示物，它便额外具有海岛此地类别。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·8 | Xolatoyac, the Smiling Flood | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, untap each permanent you control with a counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，重置所有由你操控且其上有指示物的永久物。

trans-unit.source: Illustrious Wanderglyph
trans-unit.target: 辉亮漫游石

trans-unit.resname: LCC·9 | Illustrious Wanderglyph | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)
trans-unit.target: 登殿（如果你操控十个或更多永久物，则于这盘游戏接下来的时段中，你得到黄金城祝福。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·9 | Illustrious Wanderglyph | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Other artifact creatures you control get +2/+2 as long as you have the city's blessing.
trans-unit.target: 只要你有黄金城祝福，由你操控的其他神器生物便得+2/+2。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·9 | Illustrious Wanderglyph | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each upkeep, create a 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature token.
trans-unit.target: 在每个维持开始时，派出一个1/1无色地侏衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.source: Altar of the Wretched
trans-unit.target: 卑骨祭坛

trans-unit.resname: LCC·10 | Altar of the Wretched | Card Text

trans-unit.source: Wretched Bonemass
trans-unit.target: 卑劣骨群

trans-unit.source: Wretched Bonemass's power and toughness are each equal to the total power of the exiled cards used to craft it. Wretched Bonemass has flying as long as an exiled card used to craft it has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, reach, trample, and vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 卑劣骨群的力量和防御力各等同于化炼它所放逐之牌的力量总和。 只要某张化炼卑劣骨群所放逐之牌具有飞行异能，它便具有飞行；且先攻、连击、死触、敏捷、辟邪、不灭、系命、威慑、保护、延势、践踏与警戒异能亦比照办理。

trans-unit.source: Ore-Rich Stalactite
trans-unit.target: 富矿钟乳石

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R}. Spend this mana only to cast an instant or sorcery spell. Craft with four or more red instant and/or sorcery cards {3}{R}{R} ({3}{R}{R}, Exile this artifact, Exile the four or more from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{R}。此法术力只能用来施放瞬间或法术咒语。 以四张或更多红色瞬间和／或法术牌化炼{3}{R}{R}（{3}{R}{R}，放逐此神器，从你坟墓场放逐前述物件达四个以上：将此派在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.source: Cosmium Catalyst
trans-unit.target: 宇金触媒

trans-unit.source: {1}{R}, {T}: Choose an exiled card used to craft Cosmium Catalyst at random. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: {1}{R}，{T}：随机选择一张化炼宇金触媒所放逐之牌。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: Deep goblins laugh at humans' wands. They cast spells with their hammers.
trans-unit.target: 深渊鬼怪嘲笑人类施法时还要用法杖。他们都是直接用锤子。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·12 | Contest of Claws | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Contest of Claws
trans-unit.target: 利爪争斗

trans-unit.resname: LCC·12 | Contest of Claws | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to another target creature. If excess damage was dealt this way, discover X, where X is that excess damage. (Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with that mana value or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对另一个目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。如果以此法造成过量伤害，则倾探X，X为该过量伤害之数值。（从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张法术力值等于或小于该数值的非地牌为止。施放之且不需支付其法术力费用，或将之置于你手上。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。）

trans-unit.source: Whenever Tetzin or another double-faced artifact enters the battlefield under your control, mill three cards. You may put an artifact card from among them into your hand. Craft with six artifacts {4} ({4}, Exile this artifact, Exile the six from among other permanents you control and/or cards from your graveyard: Return this card transformed under its owner's control. Craft only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 每当铁钦或另一个双面神器在你的操控下进战场时，磨三张牌。你可以将其中的一张神器牌置于你手上。 以六个神器化炼{4}（{4}，放逐此神器，从由你操控的其他永久物和／或你坟墓场的牌中放逐前述物件达六个：将此牌在其拥有者的操控下移回且已转化。只能于法术时机化炼。）

trans-unit.target: 金轮巨像

trans-unit.resname: LCC·13 | The Golden-Gear Colossus | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vigilance, trample Whenever The Golden-Gear Colossus enters the battlefield or attacks, transform up to one other target double-faced artifact you control. Create two 1/1 colorless Gnome artifact creature tokens.
trans-unit.target: 警戒，践踏 每当金轮巨像进战场或攻击时，转化至多另一个目标由你操控的双面神器。派出两个1/1无色地侏衍生神器生物。

trans-unit.resname: LCC·13 | The Golden-Gear Colossus | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The sum is greater than the parts.
trans-unit.target: 整体之力，更胜各部之和。

trans-unit.source: {T}, Remove a counter from another permanent you control: Populate. Activate only as a sorcery. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，从另一个由你操控的永久物上移去一个指示物：殖民。只能于法术时机起动。（派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: LCC·14 | Xavier Sal, Infested Captain | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Proliferate. Activate only as a sorcery. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲另一个生物：增殖。只能于法术时机起动。（选择任意数量的永久物和／或牌手，然后为其已有之每种指示物各多放置一个同类的指示物。）

trans-unit.source: Apex Observatory
trans-unit.target: 天顶观星台

trans-unit.source: Apex Observatory enters the battlefield tapped. As it enters, choose a card type shared among two exiled cards used to craft it. {T}: The next spell you cast this turn of the chosen type can be cast without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 天顶观星台须横置进战场。于它进战场时，选择一种牌张类别，且须是化炼它所放逐之两张牌所具有之共通者。 {T}：对你本回合中施放的下一个该类别咒语而言，能以「不支付其法术力费用」的方式来施放。

trans-unit.source: Though they had never left the Core, the Oltec knew the stars.
trans-unit.target: 欧尔特克人虽从未离开世界核心，但亦知星界存在。

trans-unit.target: 当恐龙头饰进战场时，将它贴附在目标由你操控的生物上。 于恐龙头饰新贴附于某生物上时，选择一张化炼恐龙头饰所放逐的生物牌。 佩带此武具的生物是最后所选之牌的复制品。 佩带{2}
